title: Five-Star Maldives Island Paradise Glamour with Art Trail & 12 Gourmet Restaurants
description: At the boundary between exceptional five-star luxury, the endlessly shimmering North Malé Atoll and the extraordinary lies Patina Maldives, masterfully positioned on the Fari Islands, the archipelago’s soulful centre of artistry. Boasting just 110 villas and studios - each designed to seamlessly blend indoor extravagance with stunning outdoor spaces - the resort offers exclusive privacy amidst the spellbinding beauty of the Maldives, just a 45-minute scenic speedboat ride from Malé. After moments spent swimming among sea turtles or discovering spectacular art installations, a culinary journey across 12 exceptional restaurants awaits - discover Nordic-Japanese fusion at Koen, savour sunsets and moussaka at Aegean eatery Helios or head to Fari Beach Club for ice-cold sips and sensational sushi on golden sands.
offer_address: North Male Atoll, Fari Islands, Maldives, Maldives, 20026
